      • givePlague

        public void givePlague​(int number)
        Parameters:
        number - Takes an int input of 1, 2 or 3 the amount of members that will be given the plague Based on how many members are given checks all the players that are alive gives a certain amount the space plague or if not many crew gives them all space plague space plague reduces the heros effected health by 10 per day.

      • checkIfDead

        public void checkIfDead​(java.lang.String reason)
        checks if the player is dead if they player count goes below 2 the lose screen is displayed.
        Parameters:
        reason - Takes the reason global param which holds the reason why the player has lost e.g. hunger death

      • damageShip

                       java.lang.String reason)
        Parameters:
        damage - takes parameter int of the amount of damage the ship will take in damage
        reason - takes the reason string as imput as to the reason the player loses this will be the input of ship dying.

      • addCredits

        public void addCredits​(int credits)
        Parameters:
        credits - Takes input amount you want to increase the players credits by, this is an int value.

      • giveScrap

        public void giveScrap​(java.lang.String scrap)
        Parameters:
        scrap - takes "large" or any other value string if large is input increases credits between 151 and 200 otherwise its between 51 or 50
